content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front steps around 9-9:30 pm in late april or early may. across the street looking west, i saw lights approaching and thought to myself, "he's flying awful low." i turned my head for some reason, maybe my dog, i do not recall, but when i looked back up it was practically overhead and i saw a swirling multi-colored smoke, yellow, a reddish-orange, and maybe a bluish or greenish smoke, not mixing, but swirling in their own area within that circle. i was slowly making a 90 degree turn right over my house. it banked slightly and that's when i noticed the central light. i heard a soft, low hum, like an electric motor. 
i remember getting up and walking to the end of the porch and watching it as it slowly drifted south. there were two white lights on the rear of the craft which were more centered and were not the same lights beneath in the three corners of the craft.
i would most like to know about the center light. i could find no pictures of any triangular craft with a multi-colored central light. i'm sure it was stealth craft. are there any military craft with such a central light or any ufo reports of the same?
content.summary: 3 corner lights were white; center light was much larger and seemed to have red, yellow, and maybe blue or green smoke-like swirling around.

content.detailedDescription: Today at 6:55 pm while driving i noticed a white cigar shape ufo directly over head .... it had what looked liked compartments or attachements on the side. i grabbed my phone, but i was only able to get a fuzzy photo and shaky video as it moved quickly away. no lights visible. it was moving what looked like a mile a minute. video and pix attached... you'll have to really zoom in to see the ufo on the video, but something was definitely up there. also, this is almost the exact same spot where other ufos have been seen for decades.
content.summary: Today at 6:55 pm i noticed a white cigar shape ufo directly over head. it looked like it had compartments or attachements on the side. i grabbed my phone, but i was only able to get a fuzzy photo as it moved quickly away.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pics of an odd looking cloud formation and took several in a row as it grew dark. when i looked back at pictures it was in the pictures with a lot of odd energy in the pics on the ground afterword. i never saw it with my naked eye. did not hear anything   the air felt odd afterwords.
content.summary: Did not appear to the eye only saw it after looking at photo a minute later

content.detailedDescription: As reported to asd: "i had placed a motion activated stealth camera outside in an effort to obtain photographs of strange animals which have been appearing on my property in the past several months and which remain unidentified. when i looked at the sd card retrieved from the camera on august 2, i saw several white beams of light moving very quickly across the screen. this was obtained outside in mid-afternoon next to a sign i have near my driveway. it should be noted that the camera reacts to motion and only if large animals set it off, so anything of light weight should not cause the camera to film anything. i submitted the video for analysis by mufon in order to determine what these may be. i should also mention that i have seen a number of unexplained lights and ufos in the sky over our property in the past."
content.summary: Several white beams moving very quickly caught on video in the afternoon

content.detailedDescription:
Throughout my childhood my family and i would take a vacation to a bed and breakfast called the hazen inn located in northern wi. while at the inn we would partake in a variety of actives, one of which being fishing. my dad would fish all day and then i would always join him at night to go fishing from about 7pm until 11pm for muskies. going night fishing was nothing new to the both of us as we had been doing this for many years before this on long lake (the lake the bed and breakfast was on). i remember the experience almost as if it had happened yesterday. only two of the events i am unsure about, but i will make that clear when i tell the story. 

one night, after dinner, my dad and i went fishing. the night started out as any other night would. we were fishing on the southern end of the lake as the sun was on the cusp of setting behind the trees. i casted my bait out into the sun's reflection on the water, as i normally would hoping a fish would be in that golden strip of light, when my dad, who was behind me, exclaimed, "look at that!." i turned around expecting to see a musky following his bait in when to my surprise, there was nothing. i asked him what he saw, he just looked at me, shook his head and said, "nothing." i turned back around not thinking much about the event. i then took another cast out toward the shore where the sun was once showing. as i was bringing my bait in, my eyes began to wander and make observations about the shoreline and water. after a little my eyes began to look at the waves right next to the boat when i noticed two green glowing lights at the bottom of the lake shining up toward me. the lights almost looked like a car's headlights at the bottom of the lake, shining up through the murky green water. the quickly exclaimed, "dad look!" as he turned and i looked back where the lights were, they had vanished. he asked what i saw and i tried to explain what i had seen. he then verified that he had seen the exact same thing moments before. little did we know that this would only be the beginning to one of the most terrifying moments of our lives.

not feeling too scared by the event we continued fishing. after taking another cast i noticed two white flashing lights above the tree line. the lights were in a vertical line flashing at the same time in a steady pulse off an on. being in northern wisconsin and fishing this lake many times, i could not recall a radio tower ever being there. i asked my dad, "do you remember there being a radio tower there?" he looked at it but could not recall a tower ever being there. we stared at the tower for a minute or two when the lights began to move apart. one of the lights went beyond the tree line while the other flew to the northern part of the lake into the town. normally, we would brush the experience off as being air planes; however, the flashing light to the one flying over the lake was moving in random direction. with a plane you can normally track where a plane will appear next in the night sky, but with this there was no clear path as to where it was going to appear next. in this moment we knew that we were witnessing a ufo. feeling trapped, my dad being the comic relief to all situations said to me, "lets try communicating with it." i got a little smile on my face from the little joke as my dad went to the navigation lights on our boat. he put his hand on the switched the lights on and off three times. on the third flash, out of no where, we were the sound of a saucer buzzing our heads. the sound can only be compared to perhaps the sound that the cars make on the cartoon show the jetsons. feeling scared out of our minds my dad then said, perhaps those were birds to which i said, "those were no f$#&ing birds dad." he looked at me know that to be the truth. in this moment, i am not positive of this, but a green light (for a moment) flashed me in the eyes to which i could not see. i say that i am not sure because it only happened to me and it was brief. 

in this moment i distinctly remember looking around the lake. normally, at night, the lake has activity on or around it. whether that means a pontoon boat riding around or someone around a campfire, normally there is some type of human presence. in this night, there was nothing. the colors almost seemed to be vanished and the whole lake appeared black and white as if we had just entered a story book. with our navigation lights off, my dad and i slowly began to move into shore in the dark of the night as if we were being hunted. we eventually came up to a desolate spot on the shore well away from houses. my dad, being the crazy fisherman he is, said to me that he had seen some bait fish earlier today off of the shore and thought perhaps they may have moved in closer to shore and muskies may have came up to feed on them. so he stopped the boat and took some casts. not moving i stayed put in my seat. right into the first cast we noticed a light in the middle of the woods. at this point it was pitch black in the middle of the north woods. it could have maybe been a person, but the chances of that seem unlikely. my dad would explain the light as an intense light that was bouncing around in the woods. in this moment we didn't even turn the engine on. we quietly trolled down the shore line until we approached a house. the house was either red or green, i believe it was the red house at the end of charlyes road on the bay of the lake. the lights were around this house again. we sat in silence as we watched the lights dance around on trees behind the house. every light in the cabin was on. at some point, the lights from behind the cabin began tracing the outer edge of the windows on the front of the cabin. the light did this for each window on the cabin. then, as if a light switch had been hit, all the lights in the woods and all the lights in the cabin went out at once. 

we slowly made our way back to the bed and breakfast fully expecting to intercepted on the pier where we tied our boat up. to our joy, we did not run into anything else. we quickly drove back up the hill and into the inn. we ran into my mom and told her to the story to which she verified that she also heard the buzzing sound a half mile down the lake from where we were. she was up in her room reading a book. to this day, we have been unable to explain the events we experienced, but it makes for a great story to tell friends who are interested.
content.summary: While fishing, lights underwater, light in eyes, two ufo lights in sky, one over the lake one behind tree line, lights in woods in middle of no where.

content.detailedDescription: On 8/04/2016 at around 6 pm, i was on my parents back deck looking up in the sky towards the east. i noticed what looked to be a star, but i thought it was strange because it was still daylight. i got a pair of high quality binoculars and looked through them at the object. the object was a glowing white light, it was round and looked to have blinking red lights in the inside. i continued to look at the object through the binoculars off and on for two hours. the object appeared to have changed shaped to round, and then oval, and back to round. the object appeared to stand still when i looked at it with my naked eye, but when i looked at it with the binoculars, it appeared to moved up and down and side to side. when i first noticed the object, it was towards the northeast, it slowly moved eastward until i no longer could see it. by the time it got directly east  my view was obstructed from the trees. my location was eastern ohio, on the ohio river. across the river is the northern panhandle of west virginia. i saw about two or three airplanes in the air at pretty low altitude during the time i was observing the object. the pittsburgh airport is less than very near to my location. the object was much higher in the sky than the airplanes. the object was reported on a local pittsburgh news station on cbs pittsburgh. i attempted to take a picture of the object on my cell phone camera, but the object did not appear on the photo.
content.summary: White ball of light. changed shaped. red glowing spots in middle.

content.detailedDescription:
Please view the video of the moon base on the moon. i know this is not a
ufo sighting but this is the only way to get in contact you people to show what is on the moon. i have other videos to show this moon base and others.
please call me mr. harvey kilgore 407-536-1283 or email me.



back in sep5,2011 i was looking at the moon and i caught on tape this two story
complex 6 o’clock position at the bottom of the moon. you will be able to see 
exceptional great. best video ever taken of any object on the moon.
content.summary: Moon base please watch my video

content.detailedDescription: Watched it hover for about 5 minutes then it just dropped towards the ground like a rock. purple in color.
content.summary: Watched it hover then it dropped towards the dround like a rock

content.detailedDescription:
My granddaughter went out into her parents garage around 2pm raised up her
cell phone and started to video tape the rain cloud that was coming in her direction.
just as soon as she started video tapeing the cloud the ufo was captured 
coming up off the ground left side of the screen. it went up and then shot across the sky, was gone in less than a second. which you will see in the video.
absolute pure luck to catch this ufo.She ran inside and showed her mother and father.
content.summary: Triangular in shape

content.detailedDescription: my friend and i sometimes sneak onto this golf course that is down the street from us just to mess around. there's not usually people  at the lodge when we go because it's so late. but this time there seem to be someone there. so i plan was to just sit there until he left. we saw his car start up and him start to drive.  we saw this guy driving to a place that we've never seen before so we it was followed him. it was just another building that we haven't discovered. we hid until he left. when he left we just started messing around at the new building that we descovered.  as were doing this we where still paranoid that could be someone around that could catch us. we are on the left side of the building looking toward the lodge between us in the lodge were a lot of trees. there was streetlights by the lodge and we saw the lights from the streetlights seeping through the trees and reflecting off some sort of vehicle in the distance i ran over to check it ou. there was street lights by the lodge and we saw the lights from the streetlights seeping through the trees and reflecting off some sort of vehicle on the distance. i ran over alone to check it out it was very dark so i got frightene i ran over alone to check it out it was very dark so  i got sort of frightened. so i turned around and told my friend to come with me through the path to the vehicle. we got there it was just a little bulldozer. so we just started messing around with it. my friend climbed inside the small bulldozer the bulldozer was facing a lot of trees. i saw shovel so pick it up just to look cool.  my friend and i often use an app called snapchat. so on this app you pretty much just take videos and post them so your friends can see him.  my friend was in the bulldozer taking a video for snapchat. i was standing on the rim of the wooded area with the camera on me. i heard some rustling to the left of me as i glanced over i saw  many of the branches flowing towards me like someone ran through it. i get really frightened thinking it was a coyote or something. i run just around 10 feet turn around to look at my friend.I tell my friend to get out of the bulldozer. he couldn't speak he couldn't move he was so frightened. he told me he saw face next to my left shoulder. i wasn't too  frightened at this point. i thought there's no way that that could be. due to the fact that i couldn't think of an animal that was as tall as me that if gotten that close to me when i've hurt me in addition it was orange would look back on the video. we continued to hang around the golf course. when we left the golf course we check the video on my friend snapchat. on the video it shows me and a shadow come from the right of me. at this point it's hard to see but is definitely there. it's when it passes me you can see it the best. when it passes me see a bright orange stripe that kind a looks like it could be an arm. once i saw the video i was so frightened. the fact that that thing was close enough that i could of bit me.  the crazy thing about the video is when it shows me look to the left that's when i heard it when i look to the left of the being had already passed me. so whatever it was it was so fast so stealthy that i didn't hear it until i had already passed me. my friend said that when he saw the face all he could see was it go past me really fast and go back into the woods. i've tried rule out that this is an extraterrestrial. but there's just no other explanation.  in the video after my friend has put the camera down and looked at himself in the bulldozer. when he looks back up at me yours have to slowdown frame by frame  and look at my right shoulder first and when i say right shoulder i mean from which way the camera is facing. look right at my neck you'll see the shadow pass you have to watch it a few times or maybe not but is very apparent . after you see the right side continue with the rest of the video frame by frame. the most apparent image is when you see an orange thing i don't know what it is it could be an arm but you see a pass behind me to my left shoulder.  keep me and my friend were only messing around despite what my stupid friend says in the video.
content.summary: My friend was videotaping me and you see on the video but we believe to be an extraterrestrial

content.detailedDescription: Clear night, stars rarely as visible as then. two lights of bright yellow colour appeared moving almost symmetrically to each other in a spiral motion, it appeared they almost collided with each other a few times, but didn't. unsure about vertical distance but was at least 0.5 and at most 1.5 kilometers. the objects/lights appeared as big as a lozenge from the ground and remained very close to each other. they left a very slightly visible (mostly bright yellow, with a bit of orange in it) glow as their motion blurred the 'afterlight' of their path. without changing speed, they canceled the spiral motion, synchronized their path and speed (which differed about 15% before), and after making a suddenly huge semi-concentric circle (basically turning back 180 degrees, but this sudden turn spanned for a few kilometers), they continued leaving in a straight line, remaining synchronized and slightly increasing their speed as they moved further. obviously, their size shrunk with distance until they were completely gone. the sighting lasted for about 7-10 seconds. spotted by a 'realist skeptic', ruled out any known flying objects.
content.summary: Two almost symmetrically spiraling lights changed direction and disappeared into the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
It was in the winter of 2005, and it had snowed that night.  my son, then 11 years of age had invited one of his best friends to spend the night on a weekend night.  to me, the evening was a typical, uneventful sleepover night where the boys stayed up late and slept in the next day.  when they awoke, we were all surprised to see that it had snowed the previous night, about 3 inches.  this was enough for much excitement, so i bundled the boys in their coats, hats and gloves and sent them outside.  not a few moments later, my son came back to the front door with a panicked look on his face.  “mom!  come quick-you have to see this!”  i grabbed a coat and ran outside.  my son was at the bottom of the front steps cautioning me to look down.  we were on the front landing.  to be able to see comfortably through the front window from the landing, one would have to stand about 7 feet tall.  what we saw directly below the large front window were two big “footprints”.  my cell phone at the time was an older nokia flip phone, and i didn’t know how to do videos with it.  frankly, the thought didn’t even cross my mind as i was dumbfounded by what i saw in the snow.  the prints looked like large (size 13 approximately) “y” shapes with the “y” stem and “toes” being large.  being careful not to disturb the prints and surrounding snow, we walked to about the middle of the yard, about 20 feet away to follow the prints as they progressed toward the house.  with the new-fallen snow as fresh and undisturbed as it was, it was absolutely unmistakable that the prints “appeared” in the middle of the yard and advanced toward the base of the front window.  this looked as though the creature was “set down” in the snow at that particular point in the yard.  the boys were obviously extremely concerned about what we saw.  i recall somewhat passing it off as a bizarre creature that had somehow made its way to the house.  after all, the parents of my son’s friend were to arrive at any time now, and i had much to do that day.   

fast forward to march 2010 and my son, now 16 years old, was on spring break.  we had tickets to a chicago bulls game and he and his friend were anxiously packing for the long weekend trip to the windy city.  this was the same friend who’d spent the night five years before.

we were in the kitchen going over the necessary items for the trip, and my son said to me most seriously  “mom” (pause), “do you believe in extra-terrestrials?”  “why, of course i do”, i responded whole-heartedly. 

my son and his friend began to share the story of that night back in 2005.  as the boys were still fairly young, they stayed upstairs to sleep, rather than in the basement.  the upstairs of our ranch house is simple and without a foyer, a guest would open the front door and walk right into the front room. 

the front room has a large 13 foot–long window, approximately 3 feet tall.  it has blinds on it that are partially open at all times because the open /close mechanism is broken.  the area is backwards l-shaped, and as you walk through the front room, there’s a small sitting area directly across from the large window, toward the back of the house.  this is where the boys set up camp, complete with tv, couch and sleeping bags.  

i was asleep in a bedroom down the hall and was unaware of anything happening throughout that night.  according to the boys, they were lying on the floor facing the tv, with the large 13 foot window to their backs.  they began to get ready to sleep, so the lights were turned off and so was the television.  the room was completely dark.  just a few moments later, somewhere between midnight and 2 am, both boys saw a reflection on the tv and the wall in front of them of a bright green light. the frightened boys huddled on the couch, barely peeking their heads up, to see if there was something they could see. this green light emitting into the room filled up the entire 13 foot-long window initially.  then, the light began to pan from left to right, accelerating with every second.  suddenly and at the speed of light, the brightest green light ever imaginable was seen and disappeared.   

…it had snowed that night.
content.summary: Bright green light emitted into the living room of a large 13-foot window.  light panned left to right and accelerated with every second.  with speed of light, the brightest green light every imaginable was seen and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Let the dog out at midnight.  spotted the brightly flashing object in the sky.  it rapidly changed colors and hovered for 10 minutes in the west.  it then continued west until out of site.  a commercial airline passed to the east during the event.  my daughter witnessed this event with me.  we used a telescope to zoom in for a better look and realized it was also changing shapes from round to domed.
content.summary: Obeserved ufo in the western horizon.

content.detailedDescription: While taking photos of lightning i noticed that i had captured a couple objects in a few of the photos. there is a single photo that clearly has an object just above the tree line. there is also a series of 12 pictures that an object can be seen in a couple of the pictures pretty clearly and can be seen inside the cloud in a couple of others. the object seems to go into and back out of the cloud throughout the series of pictures. i took the pictures with my cell phone with an application that is designed to take pictures of lightning. the series of 12 pictures is taken in just a couple seconds. the object in the series is near the center of the photos. some of the pictures are dark and don't show much. i have posted the ones with the objects in them. you can see the object is in almost the exact same spot throughout the series except that it goes into the cloud.
content.summary: Objects appeared in photos while taking pictures of the lightning

content.detailedDescription: On august 5th between 2am and 3am i was taking pictures of the lightning. while i was reviewing the pictures that i had taken i noticed two different objects in some of the pictures that i had taken. there is a single picture that clearly shows an object towards the left side of the picture just above the tree line. there is also a series of 12 pictures that shows an object in a few of the photos near the center of the pictures. some of the photos are dark and show nothing but in the pictures that are clear the object seems to go into and back out of the cloud. to can see the object in the cloud as a shadowed image. i took the photos with my cell phone with an application that is designed to take pictures of lightning. the series of 12 photos were taken at 2:39am and we're taken within a couple seconds. the single image was taken at 3:00am. i did not see the objects with my eyes nor did i hear anything out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Two objects found while taking pictures of the lightning

content.detailedDescription: I all ways watch the night sky's and i noticed two orbs one was leading and the second one was maybe 100 yards behind it may be less both on the same path and speed then i lost track of them never seen that before one the second one look like it stop at a star then got behind the leader that's it
content.summary: Saw tow dime orbs around the stars very high above the stars headed south at 9:30 pm on the 4th august

content.detailedDescription: As we traveled home from dinner traveling south on rt. 49 in chesterton, in i looked out the rear passenger window to the east at 9pm cst.  four dull-orange colored orbs were approximately 30 degrees above the horizon and aligned in a staggered row.  the orbs did not move and i did not sense any type of communication or contact emanating from the orbs.  the orbs were not blinking and were not lights emanating from towers.  the lights were larger than stars and did not have any blinking lights associated with them.  i did not see any other craft in the area (helicopters, etc.) but did see several other planes as we continued to travel down rt. 49.  since i was a passenger in the car, i was able to get a sustained look at the orbs (approximately 3 minutes long).  their formation, lack of motion, dull orange color, and lack of additional lights allowed me to confirm that these were not conventional aircraft.  i could not ascertain the size of the orbs, but they were very noticeable in the night sky.  one-by-one, the lights disappeared from left to right.  they did not "blink" out, but rather seemed to dissipate slowly and simply fade away over the course of about 10 seconds per orb.  while i did not sense any form of communication, there appeared to be intelligent control behind the craft with what appeared to be an intent to be observed or seen by individuals traveling this stretch of highway.
content.summary: Four orbs aligned in a staggered pattern remained stationary on the skyline.  after several minutes they disappeared one-by-one starting with the left orb and and finishing with the right.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the lightning between 2am and 3am on august 5th. when going through the pictures i had taken i noticed a few pictures with an object in them. there is one photo by itself that clearly shows an object over the trees toward the left of the picture. the other set of pictures is a burst of 12 pictures taken within a few seconds of each other. most of the pictures appear dark and not much can be seen. the other pictures though show an object that appears to go into the cloud and back out again. the object is near the center of the photo. the object can be seen in the cloud in a couple of the pictures but it can clearly be seen in two of the pictures. i took the pictures on my cell phone with an application that is designed to take pictures of lightning. i did not see the objects or hear anything other than thunder.
content.summary: Objects found in pictures while taking photos of lightning

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on a dangerous road, too dangerous to stop and take any pictures. i noticed it when the car in front of me almost came to a complete stop as it came into our view above the trees. at first i thought it was a plane, then a blimp, but the shape was so clear. it was - as best i can describe it - a trapezoid shaped object, similar to a triangle, glowing and white, with 3 huge lights underneath it pointed towards where my car was headed. it wasn't moving when i saw it at first, but as soon as i passed it i could no longer see it, but my significant other - who i immediately dialed - said it was above him approx. 12 miles away. i just wanted to see it again to really understand and get a better look at it - i'm not sure if my eyes were playing tricks on me, if it was just a blimp or plane, but it left a few people confused.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Possible sighting

content.detailedDescription: Gone to bed looked out of window on flight path can see the planes at night this different white surface oval fast no noise zig zaged across the sky very fast about 3 seconds from right to left no lights no noise ufo went out of view watching the sky for over 50 years seen planes shooting stars comets milky way this was differant
content.summary: Fast object no sound colour white  zig zag movement across clear sky no planes about not on flight path

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the lightning between 2am and 3am on august 5th. when going through the pictures i had taken i noticed a few pictures with an object in them. there is one photo by itself that clearly shows an object over the trees toward the left of the picture. the other set of pictures is a burst of 12 pictures taken within a few seconds of each other. most of the pictures appear dark and not much can be seen. the other pictures though show an object that appears to go into the cloud and back out again. the object is near the center of the photo. the object can be seen in the cloud in a couple of the pictures but it can clearly be seen in two of the pictures. i took the pictures on my cell phone with an application that is designed to take pictures of lightning. i did not see the objects or hear anything other than thunder.
content.summary: Objects found in pictures while taking photos of lightning

content.detailedDescription: Northern sky, but traveled west to east. appeared as a reddish ball of light, had a square red reflection attached above it, almost appeared as on fire, but was travelling as a plane would, although no sound. it completely traveled out of sight, also as a plane would, but could see nothing other than the red light.
content.summary: It was at dusk, and both my husband and i witnessed.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok around 9:40pm on august 16 2016 me and my 15 year old nephew qent outside so i could smoke a cigarette and when i walked to the end of the carport i looked up to see the stars or maybe also with the home of seeing a ufo.I have witnessed more then 8 sightings right down here in se oklahoma over the span of the last 4 years but this will be my first official report.When i caught the lights of the craft with my pariphial vision i told my nephew to look up that there was a ufo and it the ufo was just darting all around left to right up and down and in circular motions all the while doing all the jumpin all around it stared to slowly move a way back behind a bunch of trees.I have an app on my phone that lets you use your phone as a flashlight and its pretty bright plus i live in the country so theres little light polution from the city.Ok so on t
the app there is this flashlight which is realy bright.It also has a setting on it to make it flash 
like a strob.So i started flashin the light and it seemed to respond with rappid movements and strobing lights.Then ot pretty much faded away behind a line of trrees.Ok so around a hour later me and my nehew go outside so i could smoke and do some more uwhat tching and boom there was what i thought might have been the same object so i started flashing it with my phones light and then the object really started to dance for us.Ok then that happened around 2 in the morning.Me and my nephew go back inside so i could download a app that flashed red and blue strobes like a cop car. when i came outside there was i have to say atleast 6to7 slow and silent obje cts moving over my house and all around it all going pretty much going towards the object or objects if you will.All of them had red flashing lights on them that blinked pretty slow.And they all had like a yellowish looking set of lights on the backend of the crafts that were flying overhead and around my whole property at verry low speeds as if surveillancing the place.The objects looked to be round in the front at the nose and flat in the back where the red and dirty looking yellowish lights were flashing in what looked like a sequence of up to 6 maybe 7 lights.We got nervous because there was a lot of them flying back and forth over us so we went back inside.
content.summary: Went out on the porch to smoke a cigarette looked up and the it was strobing redish white and yellow flashing bright at times and diming at others.The thing was moving all around zipping up down left to right and in circles.

content.detailedDescription:
Please excuse my english.

i was in my livingroom, and from the windows in my livingroom i have a full view of the little mountain south east of my home. it was dark outside at this point. i was sitting in the couch when i registered some outside movement in my side-sight. i turned towards the window and saw a bright, round white oval-shaped light hovering in the sky over the mountaintop. the sky was clear of clouds so i could see that it wasn`t a star. at first i thought it was a plane, but it stood still and i saw no other lights coming from the object as i continued to watch it. i opened the window to hear if it was a plane, but it was no sound. the object started to move, very slowly, a bit up and a bit down, but it didn`t go anywhere. after about 15 minuites of watching this thing i decided to look up on my computer if there were any planes that was passing in the area. there were none. i went back to the window, the object was still there, but now i could see to more oval-shaped lights coming in slowley from each side directly underneath the larger one. it almost looked like they merged into eachother and hovered underneath the bigger one. the objects remained hovering like this for about 30 minutes, before being what i only can describe as pulled into the larger object overhead.Then the larger object started swinging a couple of times before shooting up and in a matter of seconds being out of sight.

i did not feel afraid during this observation, but rather intrigued. i tried in my mind to come up with rational explenations, but i had a feeling in my gut that this was something "not of this world". i have not observed this type of phenomena before or after this observation.

my boyfriend at that time was also present and he saw it too. he also double-checked online to see if there were any military-rehersals or something like that going on near-by, but couldn`t find anything, anywhere.
content.summary: Saw hovering lights , one on top and two underneath

content.detailedDescription: Waiting near suv in parking area after june 11, 11th annual symphony in the flint hills 7 miles south of cottonwood falls on hwy 177. turn west onto rock road and continue 7 miles to the concert site. many other event goers all around the area. we were all waiting for traffic to  clear out and take our turn to leave event.I was with my friend who had lost their glasses and could not safely drive at night due to farsightedness. i was looking at the moon with pocket size binoculars. i had found a steady position and stabilized and focused on the moon when a small point of light appeared to drop out of the moon and swoop leaf-like into view as a triangular shaped object approximately the same size as the moon through the binoculars. it hovered had whit lights at each corner of object.I asked my friend if they saw what i saw and they noted it "looked like it dropped out of the moon" they could note the shape and color of the lights clearly even with poor vision. i heard a voice in my head tell me i want to look at the moon. the object slowly started to drift out of view through the binoculars and i really had to "fight" to shake loose the thought of only focusing on the moon. i kept my sight on the object through the binoculars for the entire experience,my friend was next to me watching this occur unaided by binoculars and they could see it clearly even w poor eyesight, i have no clear sense of distance because i was looking through binocs.It slowly drifted horizontally. i could see a  solid object that seemed to  reflect the dark sky but it was slightly matte in finish. i could distinguish it as solid.Lights changed color to blue and appeared on the edges not the corners. white corner lights turned off. continued on path when lights turned all red and appeared at the corners. stopped, hovered a second then slowly reversed horizontal course very briefly then returned traveling ene on original trajectory. object moved along path then slowly began descending and as it did the lights changed to a violet color and went out of sight behind a ridge line in the flint hills. object did not ascend again. making no sound. no one around us seemed to notice. we both had sense object was there all along and observing the event? it felt as if it was simply making us aware of its presence. like it  was only for the two of us to see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking at moon through binoculars, star seemed to drop like a leaf from the moon and warped into view as a triangular craft equal in size to moon as viewed through binoculars white lights at corners, hovering in view near moon then slow horiz move to ene

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had just arrived at my parent's house to pick up a vehicle. we were to the southwest part of the driveway and had just put up the top on our convertible. i noticed strange white  lights in between some of the trees on my parents property that look to the south east. i shouted for my husband and we walked to the house to get a better look. he initially thought it might be a helicopter, but there was no sound at all. we walked closer to the cornfield behind their house and we saw two large lights moving parallel to each other, and evenly in the sky. they were blinking slowly, but not in sequence with each other or in any discernible  pattern. we could not see any detail between as it was dark. it moved slowly over the southeastern sky over the woods. we went inside to get my parents. my mother and i went on the back deck and observed the lights, more small in size, hovering. my mother got my father and he joined me and my husband and mother out on the deck facing the east. we all watched as it hovered, then seemly moved further away and tilted with the right light being up high and the left being lower, then it disappeared from sight. i did notice that there was a plane flying up high with blinking lights to the northeast of where we were standing.  we were all very perplexed as we had never seen anything like this. my father was in the army and we all grew up seeing different aircraft from safb (scott air force base). it did not have a red blinking light and it was far lower than any planes we had seen aside from crop dusters. it was also dark and we heard no sound that would indicate aircraft we're used to seeing. my husband and i left within about 2 minutes of the object's disappearance and headed east toward the town of ashley and we observed no further sightings of the lights.
content.summary: Witnessed two large parallel lights in the sky travel soundlessly over woods and move off to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
I reported earlier about my grandmother relaying an event that she witnessed in manchester england when i was around 4 years old. this is not the first strange occurrence that my grandmother has witnessed.
she told me about two other strange occurrences in her life which were brief and not detailed. i tried at the time to get more information from her but she was unable to give any. now please remember that my grandmother was a simple woman, born in rural india in the height of the british empire, she never learned how to read and in all the years that i knew my grandmother she never showed interest in aliens or ufo’s or the like and i always got the impression that she never believed in life beyond the stars mostly because she lived a simple life.

event two– balls of light from construction site.

the second event happened over the period of many years and i believe it started when a fancy condo was being built next to my grandmothers apartment block. at the time she was living in hackney, england around 10 years ago.
she reported seeing strange lights floating in or around the building site and strangely enough the building site took a long time to be finished because it kept having structural issues and kept falling apart. in case you are curious the site was previously a children’s library.
on one occasion my grandmother reported seeing a ball of light enter through her window and float around her room for a minuet or so before flying back out of the window and vanishing.

so to conclude these two events my grandmother witnessed and now i have relayed them to you. i hope it becomes of help in the future.
content.summary: Orbs and strange lights around construction site, construction had trouble being completed

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the front porch having a cigarette with my fiance when i first observed the light in the southern sky at approximately a 45 degree angle on the horizon.  it appeared to be approaching at a rapid speed.  the object then appeared to stop and hover.  my first impression of it was a very fast moving aircraft.  the object hovered for several minutes in which time i began to record it in time for it to descend rapidly below the tree lines.  the object then reappeared several moments later moving to the east before it made a very rapid ascent to a higher altitute, roughly 70-80 degrees to the horizon.  it remained in a nearly stationary position in which it emitted a red/white light which appeared to either flicker or possibly strobe.  
  it remained in this position for approximately 3 minutes or so before it began a near vertical descent.  it's rate of descent increased as it got lower to the horizon.  it also appeared to be closer as the object appeared larger as it neared the treeline before disappearing.  
  my feelings at the time was of disbelief and of trying to identify the object.  i have a master's degree in aeronautics and i was trying to figure out how to rationalize what i was seeing.  the only possible explanation i can come up with is a drone with a light array on it, however, from my viewpoint and with the time/distance traveled, it appeared to be moving way too fast to be a drone.  
   i am attaching the video i took and am hoping someone from a different vantage point will report it as well so that a triangulation can be made to determine if this was a drone or something else.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light in southern sky made several rapid climbs and descents

content.detailedDescription: Returning from a scheduled ghost hunt at rolling hills asylum, i live in house behind asylum. i looked over at neighbors house which is about 250 feet away, west of the building. i saw a green laser beam shining over the house. i walked around the corner headed west on linden road. about 150 feet west of the intersection when i had a clear line of sight of the field i then saw the cigar shaped craft hovering over the field emitting the green laser beam in an easterly direction. the cigar shaped craft was about 200-250 feet in length with orange glowing lights on either side. it had hovered for only 10-15 seconds then it disappeared in thin air, no sounds. i was nervous and anxious. as a former combat medic licensed security and paranormal investigator at rolling hills asylum i have never been so scared or in shock as much ever in my entire life.
content.summary: Hovering cigar shaped object emitting green laser beam over house

content.detailedDescription: Smoking a cigarette i check the sky's normally for anything unusual. at first i thought it was a star. the object was red. it stock motionless in the mid atmosphere then it would move east,then hover, then it shot off into space. i  was amazed. it was totally cool. it shot into space.
content.summary: Red orb shot off into space
